metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000427 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
marked version 0.3.6 and earlier is vulnerable to an XSS attack in the data: URI parser.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
node-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-marked package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9+dfsg-1').
